select pr.id, pr.user_code, pr.order_code, pr.amount, pr.create_date, pr.merchant_id, ui.name as userName, ui.phone as userPhone, ui.images as userImages, oi.start_address, oi.end_address, mi.name as merchantName, mi.principal, mi.phone as merchantPhone, mi.address from payment_record pr left join user_info ui on (ui.code = pr.user_code) left join order_info oi on (oi.code = pr.order_code) left join merchant_info mi on (mi.id = pr.merchant_id) where 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{paymentRecord.userName},'%')
AND mi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{paymentRecord.merchantName},'%')
AND pr.order_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{paymentRecord.orderCode},'%')
AND mi.user_id = #{paymentRecord.merchantId}
order by pr.create_date desc
